document.full_text: yemeni president ali abdullah saleh, who has agreed to sign a gulf-brokered power transition, called on friday for early elections to prevent bloodshed as three months of protests raged on in the fractious country.
document.title: saleh calls for early election as yemenis protest
lines_and_colors: yemeni president ali abdullah saleh, who has agreed to sign a gulf-brokered power transition, called on friday for early elections to prevent bloodshed as three months of protests raged on in the fractious country.
